title: @riot benji
body:
So i just played a game with you and we won, but people were being mean and harassing you just for having the name riot in your name and no other reason.

Like this ezreal just absolutely crazy at you even though we were winning. 

My question is, does this happen often?, and if it does, why dont you have secret accounts and play on them instead?

I was nocturne and was 18/8

replies.body: I like how you pointed out your KDA for no reason at all, lol.

> [{quoted}](name=Batchy,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=koKPafNh,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-03-21T13:15:02.793+0000)
>
> I like how you pointed out your KDA for no reason at all, lol.

well I mean he made a thread showing that he was playing with a mod and highlighted his score, boast thread real
Riot do have personal accounts, they use the Riot accounts while at the office, Riot doesn't care about players, so they mute everyone.

> [{quoted}](name=Colonel Squiggle,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=koKPafNh,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-03-21T13:09:09.503+0000)
>
> At 1130 at night?

Yes, because no Rioters work night-shifts.
probs cus he fed zed and people think having 'riot' next to your name means you're a challenger MLG pro gamer sponsored by V energy drink, swag 420 n0 scope.
He was getting harassed from the start of the game which i think made him go on tilt, he was very calm about it though.
I've played with him at least 5 times in ranks so far
